department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is inviting consulting firms with Electrical Engineering expertise to submit proposals for Standing Offers. The selected consultants shall provide a range of services as identified in the Required Services section of this document for Fisheries and Oceans Canada in British Columbia and Yukon.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: F1571-230228 OCIR - Services de génie électrique

## Solicitation Details

*   Title: F1571-230228 OCIR - Services de génie électrique (English equivalent: F1571-230228 RISO - Electrical Engineering)
*   Reference Number: WS4484045092/D Wise sketch design Catalogue 4565044501
*   Solicitation Number: WS4484045092
*   Publication Date: March 1st, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: July 17th, 2024 @ 2:00:00 PM
*   Amendment Date: July 15th, 2024
*   Expected Contract Start Date: July 1st, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: June 30th, 2026
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   UNSPSC Codes: `81100000`, `81101701`
*   UNSPSC Descriptions: Professional Engineering Services, Electrical Engineering Services

## Procurement Method

*   Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
*   Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Mandatory Trade Agreements

*   ALEC
*   CFTA
*   CCFTA
*   CPFTA
*   CETA
*   CUFTA
*   CKFTA
*   ACC Canada-Royaume-Uni
*   ALE Canada-Honduras
*   AMP-OMC
*   CPTPP

## Regions of Opportunity

*   Canada
*   British Columbia

## Trade Agreements

Applicants must meet the requirements for one of the above trade agreements at the time of submitting their bids. Please see section 7 of the solicitation for more information.

Request for Standing Offer

## Tender Details

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St,Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
*   Contact Person: Tian Lam
*   Email: Jun.a.L@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please refer to the original document for additional information. It is the sole responsibility of the bidders to ensure that this information does not get updated by ATIP events, contractors, RHS findings, or LTP or organization intraconversion not reported as artefacts
